definitions.definition: the branch of mechanics concerned with the motion of bodies under the action of forces.
the branch of any science in which forces or changes are considered.
the forces or properties that stimulate growth, development, or change within a system or process.
examples: the dynamics of changing social relations

definitions.definition: the varying levels of volume of sound in different parts of a musical performance.
a force that stimulates change or progress within a system or process.
examples: evaluation is part of the basic dynamic of the project
